activities: GenomeNext clients upload sequenced genomic data utilizing our secure online platform in order to perform the required secondary and tertiary analysis of their sequenced genomic data for the purposes of research or clinical testing. All personal data entered by clients to the GenomeNext analysis platform either through registration, account management, or the upload of genomic data files is stored securely using security and IT best practices and managed utilizing a secure data operations center.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: During account creation, accounts are established that contain organization name, address, and phone, key contacts and billing information
